title: How to be an activist without burning out
description: Activism can look like big gestures of protest, but it can also look like baking cupcakes for a charity bake sale or reading at an after school program. These tips will help you find joy in activism while avoiding burnout.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
